GalleryContent.Body: You can now wrap meshes, solids, and surfaces in a DirectShape and place it into your Revit Model.

The library is now organized in a tree view to make it easier to find the nodes you want. Node types have also been color-coded to make it easier for you to locate create, action, and query nodes in the library.
Clean up layouts considering groups as a whole or clean up layouts within groups.

GalleryContent.Header: Background Preview works on Remote Desktop and Parallels
GalleryContent.Body: For remote systems with GPUs and virtual machines with hardware-acceleration, background preview is now visible.
